event: content_block_start
data: {"type":"content_block_start","index":0,"content_block":{"type":"text","text":""}}

event: content_block_delta
data: {"type":"content_block_delta","index":0,"delta":{"type":"text_delta","text":"I'll help you get the weather information for Tokyo."}}

event: content_block_stop
data: {"type":"content_block_stop","index":0}

event: content_block_start

event: content_block_delta

event: content_block_stop

event: message_delta
data: {"type":"message_delta","delta":{"stop_reason":"tool_use","stop_sequence":null},"usage":{"output_tokens":77}}

event: message_stop
